oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Post-war photograph of Jabez Cannon, Co. C, 27th Ala. Inf. Rgt., CSA
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This is a post-war image of Jabez Cannon, Co. C., 27th Ala. Inf. Rgt., CSA. Cannon was originally from the area around Gravelly Springs, Lauderdale County, Alabama. After the war, Cannon moved to McKenzie, Tennessee and became a physcian.; In 1910, Cannon wrote of his experiences as a serial entitled "Inside of Rebeldom" which appeared in the Washington National Tribune. His stories were widely read by Civil War veterans of both sides.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Cannon, Jabez
